newsitem.title: USA: Sioux Falls cattle close $1-2 lower -- USDA.
newsitem.headline: Sioux Falls cattle close $1-2 lower -- USDA.

text.p: Trade in slaughter steers and heifers was moderately active Tuesday and compared to last Wednesday, with both classes $1.00-1.50 lower, instances $2.00 lower, USDA said. Supply was 800 head.
Slaughter Steers: Few lots Choice 3 old crop 1350-1400 lbs 67.00-67.50. High Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1400 lbs 66.00-67.00. Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1300 lbs 65.00-66.00.
Select 1-2 63.50-65.00. Select and Choice Holsteins 1-2 1300-1500 lbs 58.00-61.00, some Choice 62.00-63.00.
Slaughter Heifers: Part load Choice 3 Blacks near 1150 lbs old crop 67.50. High Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1250 lbs 65.00-67.00. Select and Choice 2-3 950-1100 lbs 64.00-65.00.
